32 class uArm_Remote_Client():
33 
34  def __init__(self,ns):
35  self.busy = True
36  self.name = ns
37  self.client_move = actionlib.SimpleActionClient(str(self.name+'uarm_move'), uarm_msgs.msg.uarm_moveAction)
38  self.client_reset = actionlib.SimpleActionClient(str(self.name+'uarm_reset'), uarm_msgs.msg.uarm_moveAction)
39  self.client_auto = actionlib.SimpleActionClient(str(self.name+'uarm_auto_move'), uarm_msgs.msg.uarm_moveAction)
40  self.status_listener = rospy.Subscriber(str(self.name+"busy"), Bool, self.callback)
41  self.ranges = '''
42 #################################
43 # #
44 # valid positions #
45 # #
46 # x element [30, 280] #
47 # #
48 # y element [-280, 280] #
49 # #
50 # z element [0, 130] #
51 # #
52 # RADIUS in x-y Ebene > 150 #
53 # #
54 #################################'''
55  print(self.ranges)
56 
57  def callback(self, data):
58  self.busy = data.data
59 
60  def move_client(self, x, y, z):
61  if not self.busy:
62  print("connecting")
63  # Waits until the action server has started up and started
64  # listening for goals.
65  self.client_move.wait_for_server()
66  print("connected")
67 
68  # Creates a goal to send to the action server.
69  goal = uarm_msgs.msg.uarm_moveGoal(x=x,y=y,z=z)
70  print("goal defined")
71 
72  # Sends the goal to the action server.
73  self.client_move.send_goal(goal)
74  print("goal sent")
75 
76  # Waits for the server to finish performing the action.
77  self.client_move.wait_for_result()
78 
79  # Prints out the result of executing the action
80  return self.client_move.get_result()
81  else:
82  return False
83 
84 
85  def move(self):
86  print("select coordinates of target position")
87  try:
88  x = int(input("x: "))
89  y = int(input("y: "))
90  z = int(input("z: "))
91  except:
92  return False
93 
94  return self.move_client(x, y, z)
95 
96  #call uarm_pump service
97  def pump(self):
98  print("select pump state True or False")
99  pump_state = False
100  if input("True / False: ") == "True":
101  pump_state = True
102 
103  rospy.wait_for_service(str(self.name+'uarm_set_pump'))
104  print("connected")
105  try:
106  service_object = rospy.ServiceProxy(str(self.name+'uarm_set_pump'), uarm_pump)
107  received_response = service_object(pump_state)
108  print("service called")
109  return received_response.success
110  except:
111  print("service call failed")
112  return(False)
113 
114 
115  def reset_client(self):
116  if not self.busy:
117  print("connecting")
118  # Waits until the action server has started up and started
119  # listening for goals.
120  self.client_reset.wait_for_server()
121  print("connected")
122 
123  # Creates a goal to send to the action server.
124  goal = uarm_msgs.msg.uarm_moveGoal(x=180,y=0,z=130)
125  print("goal defined")
126 
127  # Sends the goal to the action server.
128  self.client_reset.send_goal(goal)
129  print("goal sent")
130 
131  # Waits for the server to finish performing the action.
132  self.client_move.wait_for_result()
133 
134  # Prints out the result of executing the action
135  return self.client_reset.get_result()
136  else:
137  return False
138 
139  #call the uarm_get_state service
140  def state(self):
141  print("reading uarm state")
142  rospy.wait_for_service(str(self.name+'uarm_get_state'))
143  try:
144  service_object = rospy.ServiceProxy(str(self.name+'uarm_get_state'), uarm_get_state)
145  received_response = service_object()
146  return received_response
147  except:
148  print("service call failed")
149  return(False)
150

153  print("connecting")

194 if __name__ == "__main__":
195  rospy.init_node('uarm_client', anonymous=True)
196  try:
197  ns = rospy.get_param('~ns_client')
198  except:
199  ns = "uarm1/"
200  server = uArm_Remote_Client(ns)
201  time.sleep(5)
202

206 
207  try:
208  waiting_counter = 0
209  while True:
210  if True:
211  waiting_counter = 0
212  print("Options:")
213  print("1: move arm to position")
214  print("2: set pump")
215  print("3: reset uarm")
216  print("4: get state")
217  print("5: auto move")
218  print("6: quit")
219  print("7: instrucions/ valid positions")
220  try:
221  option = int(input(">> "))
222  except:
223  option = 0
224 
225  if option == 1:
226  print(server.move())
227 
228  elif option == 2:
229  print(server.pump())
230 
231  elif option == 3:
232  print(server.reset_client())
233 
234  elif option == 4:
235  print(server.state())
236 
237  elif option == 5:
238  print(server.auto_move())
239

241  break
242 
243  elif option == 7:
244  print(server.ranges)
245  else:
246  pass
247  else:
248  time.sleep(2)
249  waiting_counter += 1
250  print("waiting for uarm to be ready...")

252  except KeyboardInterrupt:
